title: Premium Apartments In Downtown Colombo
details:
Regal Properties (pvt) ltd, are agents for ALTAIR APARTMENTS, COLOMBO CITY CENTRE, SHANGRI-LA & CAPITOL TWIN PEAKS. These four ICONIC developments are going to change the metropolitan downtown skyline of Colombo.
Now is the time to get in. Our main aim is to give our clients the best advice on what to sellect based on many factors which you may have not considered. We will advice you on the laws, taxes and bank loan facilities available.
In the event you are a foreign national or a dual citizen, we could organise the banking channels needed for the transaction.
ALTAIR APARTMENTS
, suitable for the high end nett worth individual looking for lifes best luxury. On completion will hold the leadership as the tallest building in Sri Lanka. For more information and visit to the Show apartment, please feel free to contact us
COLOMBO CITY CENTRE
Another mega developments specially catering to the purchaser looking at a mixed development. This project is second to none internationally, and comes with a 200,000 sqft mega mall, 5 star status hotel, food court, bowling Alley, Cineplex, retail space which will house the best brands in the world. The residential apartments will be state of art with many options to select from. For more information and visit to the show apartment, please feel free to contact us.
CAPITOL TWIN PEAKS
These apartments are the affordable value for money with high class finishes suitable for the buyer on a budget. for more information please contact us.

SHANGRI-LA
This product is for the person who wants to live in Status and Style. This is a luxury development which will lead Colombo Skyline on completion. Only suited for the nett high worth individual.
